title: Mobile Web-Based Learning Design: A Case Study Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy, web navigation skills, and understanding of elementary social studies concepts
context.additional_context: In-house corporate training program aimed at strengthening the competency of elementary education instructors in designing effective social studies curricula in mobile environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more social studies learning scenarios in mobile web environments
Learners can diagnose two or more technical/pedagogical issues arising in mobile learning design through case analysis
Learners can create interactive content prototypes that enhance engagement in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
